text: Ka'uke yadi tara mandakaja sobhana kare dekhano haya phale se etake uttama mane kare, (se byakti ki tara samana ye satkaja kare?) Tabe allah yake icche bibhranta karena ebam yake icche hidayata karena [1]. Ata'eba tadera jan'ya aksepa kare apanara prana yena dhbansa na haya. Tara ya kare niscaya allah se samparke samyaka parijnata
